record.dc:title: 9FA11, 15FA11, Fayette County, Kentucky. Drake Mound Site. Grass & Twig Impressions, FA11.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Kentucky Adena and Woodland Mound Sites
record.wpa:narrative: Close-up of grass and twig impressions on bank of F31 in square 40. These are similar in appearance to those shown in Photo No. 6FA11 with the exception of the black deposit. These molds were yellow and orange in color.
